descriptionHtml:
so i fixed skyrim again (it\'s starting to get anoying at this point) and i hope that ill be posting more mods soon. anyway on to the main thing i don\'t know about anyone else but once i beat miraak i expected to get like the best armor ever instead what i got was something that wasn\'t even close to daedric this was a problem that i found with the rest of the dlc but ill get to the other armors later. i made mirrak\'s robe\'s stats better then daedric i also added an enchantment that made it so that whenever you put on the robe\'s you would automaticly got into dragon aspect mode. have fun ^_^

P.s as a special bonus i also made a amulet that activate dragon aspect with any armor you wish ^_^
author: nazothedark
